title: hows evenlynn
body: is she in a poor state or is she still strong despite the recent onslaught of nerfs.

replies.body: With the recent nerf to her W, she is dead, more or less. Her ult is currently bugged atm and does zero damage (and not "very little" but literally zero damage)

Not sure I agree with Storms there. I play AP Evelyn a lot and she does ridiculous amounts of burst damage. The added mana cost to her W takes some adjustment but with Runeglaive and her passive you gain back a lot of mana if you manage it right. 

The difficult part is your first couple clears and ganks before Runeglaive. It's not impossible, but after you make it through that slump or if you manage to get an early kill that gets you to Runeglaive faster it's basically smooth sailing. AP Eve snowballs really hard and can be a lot of fun. I recommend it.

RUNEGLAIVES ONLY WORKS ON FUCKING MONSTERS! IT DOES NOT WORK IN 1 ON 1 SKIRMISHES NOR DOES IT WORK IN TEAMFIGHTS! YOU CANT JUST GO TO THE DAMN JUNGLE IN THE MIDDLE OF A TEAM FIGHT AND REGENERATE MANA ON A CAMP AND THEN RETURN BACK TO THE TEAM FIGHT!

the W nerf completely destroys my playstyle with eve because i go max CDR on her. with a 0.9 sec CD on her Q from max CDR i go oom INSANELY fast, but im also allowed to spam my W and even able to have it up 100% most of the time in fights, especially if resets are taken into consideratinon. with 40 mana added to W i can no longer do that... even if i get frozen heart its still fucking terrible. 


it hurts even worse on AD evelynn tho, which is my preferred way to build eve. i can try to get around it with {{item:3508}} , but id have to give something up like {{item:3072}} for it... which is horrible.
I have to downvote this post just because of the word 'Triggered'.

I never said anything about it in the middle of a team fight, if you think I was implying that running to the jungle in the middle of a teamfight is a viable option then that's your problem for assuming, not mine. I also said nothing about the W cost being viable because of Runeglaive, you seem to have a hard time reading things but that's not my problem either.

I sustain my mana just fine both in the jungle and when fighting. I don't really care if it makes you angry, I've never had mana problems outside of the early game. Granted I don't go full CDR because I know what it will do to my mana pool if I do. It's not rocket science but since you had a hard time understanding what I typed I see why this simple concept frustrates you. But throwing a temper tantrum at someone who has no control over how Riot buffs or nerfs champions is just a waste of both of our time.

I think one of the core problems is that many of the people that have played her for a while are familiar with and like her as the ultimate early ganker, and this nerf just absolutely destroyed her early clears, which were painful to begin with, in order to shoehorn her into being some kind of late game carry and ignoring the identity she's had for a good while now.
Also anyone that liked bruiser eve and didn't go full fotm got boned.
Her winrate went down a whopping 0.7% with the most recent nerf. So she's basically the same. Settle the fuck down all of you "Eve is dead!" people.
I main her blind pick. Ap riot hates her but true mains will still carry
